name: Crab Attack Korean Extreme
description:
A game made by Zach Sarette for the Mini Jam 9 in 2018.

Survive three waves of crabs and save the school.

Limitations --> 2 inputs.

Theme --> Back to School

Controlls

X or Left Mouse --> Big drum hit to hit the big crabs.

Z or Right Mouse --> Stick Hit to hit the small crabs.
